meanings.definition: Of or relating to an organization or entity that transcends national boundaries.
meanings.sent1: The United Nations is a supernational organization that works to promote peace worldwide.
meanings.sent2: The European Union is a well-known example of a supernational entity.
meanings.sent3: It's like the superheroes of countries coming together to solve global problems - a supernational team!
meanings.sent4: The idea of a supernational government may seem like a far-off dream, but it could bring unity to the world.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a supernational body overseeing all nations is both ambitious and challenging.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring beyond the jurisdiction of individual nations.
meanings.sent1: The internet has created a supernational space where people from different countries can connect instantly.
meanings.sent2: Climate change is a supernational issue that requires cooperation from all countries to address.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a secret club that only exists in a supernational realm, beyond any country's reach.
meanings.sent4: Love knows no borders; it is a supernational force that unites people across the globe.
meanings.sent5: The influence of social media has made communication a supernational phenomenon, breaking down barriers.
